greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of ascent sequences of length n where no letter multiplicity is larger than k; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..20, flattened
P. Duncan and Einar Steingrimsson, Pattern avoidance in ascent sequences, arXiv:1109.3641, 2011
formula: A(n,k) = A(n,n) = A022493(n) for k >= n.
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t, p, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1,
add(`if`(coeff(p, x, j)=k, 0, b(n-1, j, t+
mathematica: b[n_, i_, t_, p_, k_] := b[n, i, t, p, k] = If[n == 0, 1, Sum[ If[ Coefficient[p, x, j] == k, 0, b[n-1, j, t + If[j>i, 1, 0], p + x^j, k]], {j, 1, t+1}]];
Table[Table[A[n, d-n], {n, 0, d}], {d, 0, 11}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 05 2018, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 25 2017
